import React, { useState } from 'react' import people from './data' import { FaChevronLeft, FaChevronRight, FaQuoteRight } from 'react-icons/fa' const Review = () => { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0) const { name, job, image, text } = people[index] // console.log(people) // functions for prev and next buttons const nextPerson = () => { setIndex((index) => { let newIndex = index + 1 return newIndex }) } return (

{name}

{job}

{text}

) } export default Review
